meanings.definition: The sides of a river or body of water.
meanings.sent1: The ducks swam along the banksides of the peaceful river.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy picnicking on the banksides of the lake during summer.
meanings.sent3: The playful otter slid down the banksides into the cool water.
meanings.sent4: The banksides whispered secrets to the flowing river.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers bloomed along the banksides, adding beauty to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The area along the edge of a river or body of water.
meanings.sent1: Fishermen often gather on the banksides to catch fish in the early morning.
meanings.sent2: Children love playing by the banksides, skipping stones into the water.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket floated away from the banksides, causing a comical chase.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on the banksides, creating a magical reflection.
meanings.sent5: The old bridge spanned the banksides, connecting the two sides of the river.
